.convertorEditable-component-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  background: #e0e1e4;
  border-radius: 4px;
  width: 387px;
  height: 61px;
  padding: 5px 7px;
  color: #252a32;
  .convert-img {
    margin: 0 10px;
  }
  .block {
    width: 107px;
    height: 50px;
    background: #f1f1f2;
    border-radius: 4px;
    padding: 8px;
    &.dashed-border {
      outline: 1px dashed #364150;
      outline-offset: -5px;
      padding-left: 13px;
    }
    .title {
      font-size: 10px;
    }
    .dropdown {
      font-size: 14px;
    }
    .value {
      font-size: 14px;
    }
  }
  .convert-img {
    width: 16px;
    height: 17px;
    content: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
  }
}
